metadata.title: USN-5195-1 -- Mumble vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that the Mumble client supported websites for public servers with arbitrary URL schemes. If a user were tricked into visiting a malicious website from the public server list, a remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5195-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mumble - 1.3.0+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 mumble-server - 1.3.0+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
